name: JumpStream
description: JumpStream is a competitive platformer built in real-time by an audience, using Mixer Interactive! The goal is to work with your audience to construct an emergent path to complete challenges in the fastest possible time.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i3 (3.4 GHz) or AMD A8-7600 (3.1 GHz) Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 6850 / NVIDIA GeForce 650 / Intel Iris Pro 5200 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 300 MB available space Additional Notes: Mixer Account required for Audience Play
